articles.title: Death and devastation as Russian rockets hit Ukraine apartment block
articles.description: At least 15 people were killed and two dozen more were feared trapped after Russian rockets hit a five-story apartment block in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region, local officials said on Sunday as rescuers picked their way through rubble.
